mapper.insert: INSERT INTO help (user_id, title, category, description, longitude, latitude, location_address, images, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{category}, #{description}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{locationAddress}, #{images}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM help WHERE status != 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM help WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM help WHERE category = #{category} AND status != 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE help SET title = #{title}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, location_address = #{locationAddress}, images = #{images}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE help SET status = 2 WHERE id = #{id}
